      • updateTerritoryArmy

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> updateTerritoryArmy(java.lang.String territory,
                                                                             int army,
                                                                             java.lang.String operation)
        This method is used to:
        • Update count of army for each territory.
        • for initial startup phase of Game.
        • Update count of army during reinforcement.
        Parameters:
        territory - Name of Territory
        army - Number of armies
        operation - Name of operation
        Returns:
        a HashMap which contains Territories and it's armies.
